text:
Gokulathil Seethai () () is a 2019 Indian Tamil-language romance and family drama starring Nanda Gopal and Asha Gowda in the lead roles with actress Nalini, Gayathri and Dhakshayini plays a important role, while Madhumitha, Fouzil Hidhayah, Vaishali Thaniga and Vinitha Jaganathan plays female supporting role and It was premiered on 4 November 2019. This series is an official remake of the Zee Telugu series "Maate Manthramu".
This series started from 4 November 2019 on Everyday at 8.00PM (IST) time slot. The story is about Vasundhra (Vasu) - a young woman belonging to a middle-class family, tries to change the arrogant and rich Arjun into a responsible person.
Synopsis.
Vasundhara "Vasu" (Asha Gowda), a young and middle class girl works as secretary to Suchithra's son Arjun (Nanda), who is very rich man and playboy. Vasu hates Arjun's attitude and behaviour but later Vasu knows that she is the one who helped Arjun from accident in childhood and also she was the Sweet-hearted friend of Arjun, whom he searching was.
International broadcast.
The series was released on 4 november 2019 on Zee Tamil. The show was also broadcast internationally on the network's international channels.
